item.title: Jill add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "We all know that a sky with clouds in it is much more interesting than one that doesn't have any." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Jill add a quote by Lisa Kogan
item.description: "...if we have to, we can do anything. We are strong, and when one of us isn't feeling all that invincible, the other will always take the wheel. We are women." -- Lisa Kogan

item.title: Jill add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "Your initial opinion on just about anything may change over time." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Jill add a quote by Kristin Hannah
item.description: "That was the thing about best friends. Like sisters and mothers, they could piss you off and make you cry and break your heart, but in the end, when the chips were down, they were there, making you laugh even in your darkest hours. " -- Kristin Hannah

item.title: Jill add a quote by Kristin Hannah
item.description: "Sometimes being a good friend means saying nothing." -- Kristin Hannah

item.title: Jill add a quote by Meg Waite Clayton
item.description: "we could hurt each other even when we weren't trying to, and that none of us was as perfect as we liked to pretend." -- Meg Waite Clayton

item.title: Jill add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "If you focus on sandbagging the beachhead, you can ignore the tsunami that's approaching. Try it any other way and you'll go crazy." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Jill add a quote by Ann M. Martin
item.description: "You got to accentuate the positive, eliminate the negative, and latch on to the affirmative. Don't mess with Mr. In Between." -- Ann M. Martin

item.title: Jill add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "I'm lonely. Why do you think I had to learn to act so independent? I also get mad too quickly, and I hog the covers, and my second toe is longer than my big one. My hair has it's own zip code. Plus, I get certifiably crazy when I've got PMS. You don't love someone because they're perfect. You love them in spite of the fact that they're not." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: Jill add a quote by Claire Cook
item.description: "It takes courage to create,' he said. 'People are afraid of embarrassing themselves by not being good enough.' Or maybe even by showing who they really are." -- Claire Cook

item.title: Jill add a quote by Dorothy Koomson
item.description: "When you can't be honest with people, you can't ever relax with them." -- Dorothy Koomson

item.title: Jill add a quote by Jane Green
item.description: "Anyone can live in a house, but homes are created with patience, time and love." -- Jane Green

item.title: Jill add a quote by Emily Giffin
item.description: "It always takes two. For relationships to work, for them to break apart, for them to be fixed." -- Emily Giffin
